article.Heading: GST to help in better description of GDP: TCA Anant
article.Summary: Come September, the true impact of the transition to the goods and services tax regime will be revealed as companies start filing their returns. While market watchers are waiting to see what impact GST will have on the country's GDP, India's chief statistician, TCA Anant doesn't think there will be that much of an impact, but expects the quality of data to improve substantially.
article.Body:
Come September, the true impact of the transition to the goods and services tax regime will be revealed as companies start filing their returns. While market watchers are waiting to see what impact GST will have on the country's GDP, India's chief statistician, TCA Anant doesn't think there will be that much of an impact, but expects the quality of data to improve substantially.

Watch video for moreâ€¦
